room_title: Escape room "The Candy Factory" by Escapade 360 in Chicago
Escape room "The Candy Factory" by Escapade 360 in Chicago
review: We highly recommend. Great setup, high quality. Very well thought out. Fun for the whole family (12 and up). Owners show passion and care.

room_title: Escape room "The Candy Factory" by Escapade 360 in Chicago
review: Our experience was so fun and it was just the right amount of challenge! I want to go back to try one of the other rooms!
